Places grassland environment and forest terrain in the target tile. Cannot be cast on arctic, desert or swamp terrain.

Converts arctic, desert or swamp terrain into fertile grassland.

See Tooltip. See WARNINGS.
--------------------------------------------------- !WARNING! Generally, Mass Army Spells do not stack with the Individual or the Mass Faction versions.
Mass Army Spells disable the equivalent Mass Faction Spells (Spellbook).
IF you want to re-enable a specific Mass Faction Spell, dispel the equivalent Mass Army Spell: CTRL-K (Govern) > Enchantments > Dispel ---------------------------------------------------
::: Incompatible w/ Shroud ::: Incompatible w/ Shroud #Faction
::: Caster and Targets must be on the same tile

Target champions receive +5 dodge (plus 2 per shadow power) and an additional +10 dodge vs ranged.
See Tooltip. See WARNINGS.
--------------------------------------------------- !WARNING!
Mass Spells are memory intensive and may provoke a crash.
Generally, Mass Faction Spells do not stack with Individual or Mass Army versions.
Mass Faction Spells disable equivalent Mass Army Spells (Spellbook). Mass Faction Spells disable equivalent Individual Spells (Spellbook).
IF you want to re-enable a specific Individual or Mass Army Spell, dispel the equivalent Mass Faction Spell: CTRL-K (Govern) > Enchantments > Dispel ---------------------------------------------------
::: Incompatible w/ Shroud ::: Incompatible w/ Shroud #Army

Opens up a rift to a shadow plane, spawning creatures of shadow for the duration of the spell's upkeep. These shadow creatures will attack anything in their way. If the upkeep is broken, the rift closes.

SpellDef.Description: All beasts in target stack are tamed, has 40% chance of success (+5% per beast power). Can only be cast in friendly territory.
All beasts in the target area are knocked prone for 3 turns, unless resisted.
Creates a Hergon lair and a herd of hergon that will roam within a large area. Can be cast in any known territory that is plains terrain.

Target Champion is driven into a wild rage; they gain +1 Move and +2 to Attack (+2 per beast power) and are granted the Maul and Rage abilities, but the unit will attack enemies without player direction. Target unit will not cast spells.

GameModifier.Provides: Unit continues to attack until it misses, each attack has a cumulative -15% to Accuracy
